question:
The chief items of exports during the rule of the Vijayanagar empire consisted of which of the following?
1) Cotton
2) Copper
3) Iron
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Agriculture continued to be the chief occupation of the people of the Vijayanagar empire. It was also a great centre of trade. The chief items of exports were cotton and silk clothes, spices, rice, iron, saltpetre, and sugar
